mapper.sql: select ID AS id, merchant_id AS merchantId, account_name AS accountName, state AS state, last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime from account
mapper.insert: insert into account(merchant_id, account_name, account_pwd, state, last_login_time, create_time, update_time) values(#{merchantId}, #{accountName}, #{accountPwd}, #{state}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
